Posts.Content: Don't know if anyone can help me with this one but I have been on tamoxifen for nearly 3 years and recently had bone pain in all sorts of joints and odd places! Has anyone else suffered from this and have any answers? Have heard it is possible to change to different drug but slightly concerned an alternative could be worse. Any advice/comments greatly appreciated.xx
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen side effects

Posts.Content: Hi Kelly Thanks for your response - hope next week is positive for you. I have put a call into my breast care nurse on wednesday and left message. Awaiting a call back so will wait and see what they advise.   Thanks again - take care Kirsty x
